# Sap Strength (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a long needle and a tiny glass bottle)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC)Â­, pg. 103

The caster drains the personal well-being from the subject, who becomes [[Exhausted|exhausted]]. After 1 hour of complete rest, characters become [[Fatigued|fatigued]] rather than [[Exhausted|exhausted]]. A [[Fatigued|fatigued]] character becomes [[Exhausted|exhausted]] again if she does something else that would normally cause fatigue. After 8 hours of complete rest, [[Fatigued|fatigued]] characters are no longer [[Fatigued|fatigued]].
